name: Divergence (GAMEINC20)
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/aBTUsPgHnaS5pDZ88

2 students and a professor were working on their project. But then, it failed and exploded. Awoken from the blast each of them had thought that they had died but instead their mind was filled in shock as they witnessed their survival and no longer in their own universe. A cyberpunk world where robots had taken over and no signs of life.. Their current objective? Survive and escape.
